rdf:Description.dc:title: Akbar: Een Oostersche Roman
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Mr. Petrus Abraham Samuël van Limburg Brouwer (1829–1873)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This book is in the Public Domain. First publication: 1872. This electronic edition is based on the third printed edition of 1878. An English translation is available as: Akbar (An Eastern Romance). W. H. Allen & Co., London, 1879. 19.5×13.5 cm, xlviii + 348 pp. A German translation is available as: Akbar, ein indischer Roman. Deutsche autorisirte Ausg., aus dem Niederländischen von Lina Schneider. H. Killinger, Leipzig, 1877. 346 pp. An Esperanto translation is available as: Akbar: Oriento Romano. Trad. Julia C. Isbrücker-Dirksen; Internacia CSEH-Instituto de Esperanto, Den Haag, 1923. This is also one of the few Dutch books that has been translated into the South Indian language Malayalam, but I have not been able to locate publication details.
